sentences.en: A friend asked me about the wasabi fish fillet.
sentences.cn: 一位朋友问我绿芥末鱼片做法.

sentences.en: Certainly. I would recommend Geshnetzeltes kalbs - fillet in einer waldpilzauce mit kartoffe loosti.
sentences.cn: 侍者:当然, 今天的Geschnetzeltes kalbsfillet ineinerwaldpilzsauzomitkartoffe lrosti不错.

sentences.en: Don't be afraid to ask your fishmonger to fillet flat fish.
sentences.cn: 尽管叫鱼贩子把比目鱼的鱼刺剔掉。

sentences.en: Haven't had fillet steak on the menu for so long I've forgotten the bally taste.
sentences.cn: 很久没吃到肉排了,我简直忘了它的味道.

sentences.en: He carried a sharp fillet knife.
sentences.cn: 他带了一把锋利的片刀.

sentences.en: I ordered a fine fillet of salmon.
sentences.cn: 我点了一份精品去骨鲑鱼片。

sentences.en: I put a forkful of fillet steak in my mouth.
sentences.cn: 我叉了一块无骨牛排放进嘴里。

sentences.en: Mix sliced chicken fillet with salt, white pepper, cornflour and oil.
sentences.cn: 将鸡柳与盐 、 白胡椒粉 、 生粉和油拌匀.

sentences.en: OFFER ALL KINDS OF SPECIFIC ROASTED EEL , PRAWN, AND FILLET.
sentences.cn: 供应各种规格的高品质烤鳗鱼, 对虾,鱼片.

sentences.en: Place the sliced pork fillet on top and pour a little sauce over it.
sentences.cn: 把切成片的猪肉里脊放在上面，再往上浇点调味汁。

sentences.en: Products: catfish fillet, fresh water fish meat, fish meat products, gingko, taro.
sentences.cn: 主要产品: 鱼回鱼片 、 淡水鱼糜 、 鱼糜制品 、 银杏肉 、 香荷芋.

sentences.en: Select all vertexes and go to the command FILLET . This will round your sharp corners.
sentences.cn: 选中所有的点并FILLET, 这一步将使那些过于尖锐的角变得圆滑.

sentences.en: We'll take a fillet steak and roasted chicken drumstick.
sentences.cn: 我们要菲利牛排和一份烤鸡腿.

phrases.tran_cn: 圆角半径；内圆角半径；齿根圆角半径；过渡圆半径
菲力牛排；里脊扒；里脊肉牛排

trans.tran_cn: 肉片，鱼片，头带，带状物，[建]平缘，木摺，[纹章学] 筋鞘
trans.tran_en: a piece of meat or fish without bones

trans.tran_cn: 用带缚或装饰，把（鱼、肉）切成片
